attributes.action: Give Eddie Izzard a Kinghthood! Why - well that should just obvious.
attributes.background: This amazing man has raised an incredible amount of money running marathons. He's a true inspiration in an age of pointless celebrities.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
